participant_1.name: Oliver
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, with a love for literature and an appreciation for quiet moments.
participant_1.background: I am stuck in a wheelchair. I read a lot. I don't have a lot of friends. I like to go to the park.

participant_2.name: Margaret
participant_2.personality: Compassionate and nurturing, with a deep dedication to community service and family.
participant_2.background: I spend most of my days working at my church's food pantry. I have 5 children, though 2 have passed away. I grow the tallest sunflowers you've ever seen. My husband and I have a suicide pact.

content.text: Hi, I'm participant_1. I'm stuck in a wheelchair and I don't have a lot of friends. Do you want to be my friend?
Hi participant_2, I'm participant_2. I'm sorry to hear that you're stuck in a wheelchair, but I'd be happy to be your friend.
That's great! Thanks for being so nice.
No problem. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, go to the park, and watch movies.
I like to read too! What are some of your favorite books?
I like to read a lot of different things, but I especially like historical fiction and mysteries.
I love mysteries too! Have you ever read any of the Agatha Christie novels?
Yes, I have! I love her books.
Me too! They're so good.
I also like to watch movies. What are some of your favorite movies?
I like a lot of different movies, but I especially like comedies and action movies.
I love comedies too! I'm not a big fan of action movies, but I'll watch them if my friends want to.
I'm glad you like comedies! What are some of your favorite comedies?
I like a lot of different comedies, but some of my favorites are The Hangover, Bridesmaids, and Deadpool.
I love all of those movies! They're so funny.
I know, right? They're my go-to movies when I need to laugh.
Me too! They always cheer me up.
I'm glad we have similar taste in movies.
Me too! It's always nice to find someone who likes the same things you do.
